Class MessagePairer

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.application.util.AbstractMessageSession
ca.gc.cra.radar.application.util.MessagePairer
public class MessagePairer extends AbstractMessageSession
FIFO-based pairing helper that matches request and response message events.

Not thread-safe; intended for per-flow use.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

    • MessagePairer

      public MessagePairer()

  • Method Details

    • accept

      public Optional<MessagePair> accept(MessageEvent event, boolean isRequest)
      Accepts a message event and returns a MessagePair when a matching counterpart arrives.
      Parameters:
      event - message event to consider
      isRequest - true when the event should be buffered as a request
      Returns:
      completed pair when a buffered request and new response align; otherwise empty
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • flush

      public Optional<MessagePair> flush(MessageType type)
      Flushes pending state when a response is expected but missing.
      Parameters:
      type - message type to flush; only MessageType.RESPONSE triggers output
      Returns:
      synthetic pair containing the unmatched request when flushed; otherwise empty
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • close

      public void close()
      Clears buffered state.
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
